function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement advanced ventilation systems, strategically plan layout to reduce cross-infection, and prioritize infection control measures.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrofitting and redesigning spaces to meet medical care standards","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement flexible design concepts to accommodate changing demands and technologies","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term planning, using adaptable and future-proof technologies","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing adaptability, convertibility, and expandability in design","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluate model performance on new data, assess variable importance, and consider feature selection techniques.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conduct research to understand the true impact of confinement on green spaces perception and use the findings to inform green infrastructure planning","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conduct further analysis to validate the significance of predictors and consider other relevant variables","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use alternative statistical techniques like cluster analysis to identify distinct patterns and relationships within the data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement policies to ensure equitable access to green roofs for all income levels.","category":"Managing low-maintenance green roof options","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote the benefits of green roofs, incentivize green roof installations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Educating about the importance of preventive measures, promoting testing and vaccination, and emphasizing the need for continuous vigilance.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing green infrastructure in urban areas, promoting rooftop gardens, and creating communal outdoor spaces in collective responsibility for disease prevention.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene measures and travel restrictions","category":"Personal
